title: Miranda Sex Garden - complete singles (+rare Radiohead cover)mp3
description:
Miranda Sex Garden - complete UK singles (+ rare Radiohead cover) (mp3) (320 kbps)


#  1991 (22 Apr)  - Gush Forth My Tears  (CD MUTE 123)
#  1993 (11 Jan)  - Play  (CD MUTE 139)
#  1993 (22 Feb)  - Sunshine  (CD MUTE 154)
#  1994 ( 9 May)  - Peep Show  (CD MUTE 163)
#  2000 (12 June) - Tonight / Sex Garden  (double "A-side" single)  (CDSDR 100)
#  2001 ( 1 Jan)  - from tribute compilation CD "Anyone Can Play Radiohead"


This is a complete set of the band's UK singles in MP3 format.  The set contains many tracks, versions, and mixes not on any of the albums.

All cover scans are included.

As a bonus, also included here is the band's cover of Radiohead's 'Exit Music (For A Film)'.  It was contributed to a various artists' album of Radiohead covers ("Anyone Can Play Radiohead"), and was the last thing the band released.


==  Note:
There is another torrent here (.flac files) which contains ostensibly the same material as this MP3 torrent.  But that torrent contains several mistakes and omissions, including:
- no precise release dates given, only years (and one of those years is wrong);
- spelling mistakes and incomplete track information;
- no catalogue numbers;
- and most importantly, that torrent contains an incorrect cover scan for the first single.  (It contains the US cover.  But the US issue had different tracks to the UK issue, so therefore that cover scan doesn't match the audio tracks.)

That torrent also does not include the Radiohead cover - which is included here as a bonus.


So this MP3 set here is the one to go for, in all ways.
